COLLECT_ACTION_SPEAK_CLEAR: Izgovori izbrani element vsebine (posebej) in jo ga potem izbriši
COLLECT_ACTION_SPEAK_CONTINUOUS_CLEAR: Izgovori izbrani element vsebine (nepretrgoma) in jo ga potem izbriši
CONFIRM_IMPORT_BACKUP: Opozorilo: Ta akcija bo zbrisala obstoječe nastavitve in jo nadomestila s podatki iz datoteke "{0}". Nadaljujem?
CONFIRM_RESET_DB: Zares želite ponastaviti privzeto konfiguracijo? Vse sedanje mreže bodo trajno izbrisane!
CONFIRM_DELETE_ALL_ELEMS: Zares želite zbrisati vse elemente v obstoječi mreži?
CONFIRM_REMOVE_USER: Zares želite zbrisati povezavo do uporabnika "{0}"? To ne bo zbrisalo uporabnika, ampak vse podatke uporabnika, ki so shranjeni na tej napravi.
CONFIRM_REMOVE_USER_LOCAL: Zares želite izbrisati uporabnika "{0}"? Ker uporabnik ni sinhroniziran, bo ta akcija dokončno izbrisala uporabnika.
LABEL_USER_ONLINE: samo s povezavo (online), ni sinhronizacije brez povezave
ERROR_CODE_UNAUTHORIZED: Neuspešna prijava, napačno uporabniško ime ali geslo.
ERROR_CODE_NETWORK_ERROR: Neuspešna prijava (napaka v povezavi), prosimo poskusite kasneje.
DB_SYNC_STATE_ONLINEONLY: samo s povezavo (online), ni sinhronizacije brez povezave
VALIDATION_ERROR_REGEX: Username must contain only lowercase letters, digits or the characters  ["-", "_"], valid length is 3-16 characters.
HEADER_COMPARE_ONLINE_OFFLINE: Informacije o uporabnikih s povezavo in brez povezave
automaticallyCloseTimeoutInSeconds: Samodejno zapri v sekundah (0 = nikoli), trenutno deluje samo v Firefoxu
insertLabelsForNewElements: Vstavite Oznake za nove elemente, ločene z ";" ali [Enter]
resetToDefaultInputConfiguration: Povrni na privzeto konfiguracijo za vnos
wrapAroundJumpToFirstElementAfterLastEle: Zavij okoli (skoči na prvi element po zadnjem elementu)
goToStartPositionAfterSelect: Pojdi na začetni položaj po izbiri
couldNotLoadModelFromAre: Ni bilo mogoče naložiti Modela iz ARE!
uploadTheSavedModelOrDownloadCurrent: Naloži shraneni model ali prenesi trenutni ARE model, da lahko definirate akcijo.
downloadTheCurrentAreModelInOrderToDefin: Prenesi trenutni ARE model, da definiraš akcijo.
label: Oznaka
preventMouseClickOnYoutubePlayer: Prepreči miškin klik v YouTube predvajalniku
moveAllElementsToThisGrid: Prenesi vse elemente v to mrežo
huffmanInputMethod2OrMoreInputEvents: Huffmanovova vnosna metoda: 2 ali več vnosov
timeoutInMs0MeansDisabled: Iztek časa v ms (0 pomeni onemogočeno)
insertWordsSeparatedBySpaceEnter: Uvozi besede, ločene s presledkom, ";" ali [Enter]
selectWithMouseClickOrTap: Izberi z miškinim klikom (ali z dotikom)
wantToRegisterAnOnlineUser: Want to register an online user?
aGlobalGridIsShownWithinEachOtherGridAnd: A global grid is shown within each other grid and can contain elements like e.g. "back" or "home".
moreWordsAvailableTypeInSearchFieldToFil: več primernih besed. Natipkaj v polje za iskanje za filtriranje.
moreWordsForThisFilterRefineSearchToShow: več besed za ta filer. Izboljšaj iskanje za prikaz večih.
noWordsForThisFilterClearSearchField: Ni besed za ta filter. Počisti iskalno polje za prikaz elementov.
rememberThisUserAndMakeItAvailableForOff: Zapomni si tega uporabnika in omogoči uporabo brez povezave
doNotCheckForAOnetimeLoginOnForeign: Ne preverjaj enkratne prijave na tuji napravi.
astericsGridIsFreeAndAllYouNeedToRegiste: AsTeRICS stran je brezplačna in vse kar potrebujete za registracijo, je uporabniško ime in geslo.
yourPasswordWillBeUsedInOrderToEncrypt: Vaše geslo bo uporabljeno za enkripcijo vaših osebnih podatkov, preden bodo sinhronizirani z oblakom. Boljše geslo pomeni boljšo enkripcijo.
rememberThisUserAndMakeItAvailableForOff: Zapomni si tega uporabnika in mu omogoči uporabo brez povezave
doNotCheckIfYouAreUsingAForeignDevice: Ne preveri, če uporabljaš tujo napravo.
synchronizeNavigationAndLockedState: Sinhroniziraj navigacijo in stanje zaklenjenega/polnega zaslona za online uporabnike
passcodeForUnlockingUserInterface: Koda za odklepanje uporabniškega vmesnika (samo številke)
allGridsAreSavedOffline: vse mreže so shranjene brez povezave
idealForUsingOnASingleDevice: idealno za uporabo na eni sami napravi
itsAlwaysPossibleToRegisterLater: it's always possible to register later.
allGridsAreSavedOfflineAndOnline: vse mreže so shranjene brez povezave in s povezavo
automaticSynchronizationAcrossMultipleDe: samodejna sinhronizacija na več napravah (npr. računalni, tablica, pametni telefon)
allDataIsEndtoendEncryptedAndOnlyYouAreA: vsi podatki so kriptirani do uporabnika in samo ti lahko dostopaš do njih
forRegistrationOnlyAUsernameAndAPassword: za registracijo potrebuješ samo uporabniško ime in geslo
disabledIfHoldDurationIsSet: onemogočeno, če je nastavljeno zadrži trajanje.
createGridElementsForWebradios: Ustvari mrežo elementov za spletne radie
noSelectedRadioStationsUseSearchBar: No selected radio stations, use search bar below to add radio stations.
noRadioStationsFoundTryAnOtherSearchTerm: No radio stations found, try an other search term.
searchingFailedNoConnectionToInternet: Searching failed, no connection to internet.
tapOnAnyElementToActivateSpeech: Dotakni/klikni na katerikoli element za aktivacijo govornega izhoda
encryptingAndSavingGrids: Enkripcija in shranjevanje strani v podatkovno bazo
errorPlayingYoutube: Error on playing YouTube video. Please check internet connection.
accessKey1NavigationAccessKey2Main: Access key 1: Navigation, Access key 2: Main
newVersionAvailableTheNextTimeYoullUseUp: New version available! The next time you re-open AsTeRICS Grid you'll automatically use the updated version.
byDefaultSearchesForRadioStationNameAdva: by default searches for radio station name, advanced search possible like e.g. tag:jazz, language:english or country:austria
thisActionAddsXNewElements: This action adds {0} new elements to the grid. Continue?
theSelectedFileDoesNotContainDict: The selected file does not contain dictionary data.
couldNotDownloadDictCheckInternet: Could not download dictionary, please check internet connection.
doYouReallyWantDeleteAllGrids: Do you really want to delete all grids? This operation cannot be undone!
doYouReallyWantResetGlobalGrid: Do you really want to reset the global grid to default?
clearAllAndImportFromFile: Clear all and import from file
doYouReallyWantDeleteAllImages: Do you really want to delete all images and symbols from all grids? This cannot be undone.
astericsGridIsFreeAndOpenSource: AsTeRICS Grid je brezplačen in odprtokoden ter gostuje na github.com.
ifYouEncounterAnErrorHaveSuggestions: If you encounter an error, have suggestions for improvement or any general feedback please don't hesitate to contact us:
termsOfServiceAndPrivacyPolicy: Pogoji storitve in Pravilnik o zasebnosti
astericsGridLicenseInfo: AsTeRICS Grid je brezplačna in odprtokodna programska oprema. Licenciran je pod {agplLink}, kar zagotavlja, da bo za vedno ostal odprtokoden.
ytTermsInfo: Če želite uporabljati integrirani predvajalnik YouTube, se morate strinjati z {ytTerms} in {googleTerms}. Vse vnesene iskalne poizvedbe za videoposnetke YouTube so poslane v {ytAPI} za pridobitev in predvajanje rezultatov videoposnetkov.
privacyPolicyInfo: The only potentially personal data value that is processed by AsTeRICS Grid is the username of online users. All other data is either stored locally or end-to-end encrypted and therefore only readable by users. Further information can be found in the {privacyPolicy}.
thankBrowserstack: We thank {browserstackUrl} for providing us free UI tests on their platform.
thankResponsiveVoice: We thank {responsiveVoiceUrl} for free non-commercial usage.
ifYouNeedHelpWithinAstericsGrid: Če potrebujete pomoč na AsTeRICS straneh, kliknite na ikono za pomoč ({openHelpIcon}) ali pritisnite [F1] na tipkovnici, da odprete uporabniško dokumentacijo na ustreznem mestu.
aLocalUserIsStoredOnlyOnThisDevice: Lokalni uporabnik je shranjen samo na tej napravi, v tem brskalniku. Če želiš ustvariti uporabnika, ki bo sinhroniziran na različnih napravah s pomočjo oblaka, lahko registriraš uporabnika s povezavo.
noActionsDefinedClickOnAdd: Ni definirane akcije, klikni na "{addAction}", da jo dodaš.
thisElementAlreadyNavigatesToAnotherGrid: Ta element vsebuje že povezavo do druge strani. To povezavo boste povozili.
noElementsClickToEnterEdit: Ni elementov, kliknite {link} za način urejanja.
thanksToHermitDaveForSupplyingDataForThi: Hvala Hermitu Daveu za nudenje podatkov za ta slovar
changeToLatestToOpen: Spremeni v {latestLink}, da odpreš tega uporabnika.
gridsCanBeTranslatedToEveryLanguage: Strani lahko prevedete v vse jezike. Za dodajanje ali urejanje prevoda uporabite "Uredi stran -> Več -> Prevedi stran".
theOnlyPersonalDataSavedIs: Edini potencialno osebni podatek, ki je shranjen brez enkripcije, je tvoje uporabniško ime. Vsi ostali podatki so kriptirani do uporabnika in do njih nihče ne more dostopati. Soglasje lahko prekličete kadarkoli tako da pošljete e-pošto na {link}. Preklic ne vpliva na legalnost procesiranja podatkov pred tem.
ifTheTranslationForYourLanguageIsNotAvai: Če prevod vašega jezika ni na voljo ali ima napake, prosimo sodelujte na platformi za prevajanje {crowdin}.
fullyShowLongLabels: Fully show long labels below images
MODE_COLLECT_TEXT: Zberi besedilo, ki se lahko poveže
useHorizontalScrollbarIfElementsDontFit: Uporabi vodoravno drsno vrstico, če se elementi ne prilegajo (v nasprotnem primeru več vrstic)
addThisElementToCollectionElementsDespit: Dodaj ta element k zbirki kljub navigaciji
factorForFontSizeOfOnlytextElements: Faktor za velikost pisave za elemente, ki imajo samo besedilo v ločenem načinu
convertUppercaseKeyboardLettersToLowerca: Pretvori velike črke na tipkovnici v male
updateGridThumbnailsConfirm: Zaradi posodobitve vseh mrežnih slikic, se bodo vse strani na hitro odprle. Nadaljuj?
aragoneseCenterOfAAC: Aragonski Center za nadomestno in dopolnilno komunikacijo (ARASAAC)
arasaacCollaboration: Od leta 2022 AsTeRICS mreža sodeluje z {arasaacLink}. Njihove povratne informacije iz prakse omogočajo AsTeRICS mreži, da se razvija v kvalificirano aplikacijo za nadomestno in dopolnilno komunikacijo – hvala!
copyrightARASAACPDF: Piktogrami od Sergia Palaoa, ARASAAC, https://arasaac.org, CC (BY-NC-SA)
searchFailedMaybeNotConnectedToInternet: Neuspešno iskanje, morda niste povezani na internet?!
LANG_EXPORT_ALL: Izvozi vse jezike, ki so na voljo na straneh
importUserSettings: Uvozi uporabniške nastavitve in konfiguracijo vnosa
doYouWantToDeleteBeforeImporting: Ali res želite izbrisati vse obstoječe mreže in slovarje pred izvozom novih? Tega ne morete povrniti!
exportUserSettingsAndInputConfig: Uvozi uporabniške nastavitve in konfiguracijo vnosa
emptyConfigToCreateAnything: Start with empty configuration in order to create any content by yourself.
author: Avtor
ifYouWantToSupportAstericsGrid: While development is currently funded within research projects (see above), the non-profit AsTeRICS Foundation pays for the running server costs. If you want to contribute to these costs, you're very welcome to donate
theFollowingRessourcesForHelpOnAstericsG: Za pomoč pri AsTeRICS straneh so dostopni naslednji viri
directlySelectElementOnPressingMouseButt: Direktno izberi element ob pritisku miškinega gumba (ne čakaj na kompletni klik)
selectWithDoubleClickOrDoubleTap: Izberi z dvojnim klikom (ali z dvojnim dotikom)
enableAcousticFeedbackUsingBeepingSounds: Omogoči zvočne povratne informacije s piski
readElementActionsInAdditionToLabel: Preberi akcije elementov glede na oznako
minimumPauseForCollectingAndSpeakingTheS: Najmanjši premor za izbor in izgovor iste celice večkrat zapored
backupFileDoesntContainData: Varnostna kopija ne vsebuje konfiguracije mreže!
pleaseAllowAccessingMicrophoneInOrderToR: Please allow accessing microphone in order to record audio
selectedAudioFileIsTooBig: The selected audio file is too big, only short samples up to 200kB (about 10 seconds) are allowed
recordedAudioIsOnlyPlayedWithCollectElem: Recorded audio is only played with collect element actions in mode "speak separately"
setActionsOfGlobalGridToModeSpeakSeparat: Set actions of global grid to mode "speak separately"
speakActionsOfGlobalGridWereSetToModeMod: Speak actions of global grid were set to mode mode "speak separately"
arasaacSupportSocialMedia: For general support and questions, please send us a private message at the {instagramLink} or {facebookLink}
communityOnFacebookGroup: In the {astericsGridFacebookGroup} you can connect with other users in order to get support or share your questions and ideas
foundBugReportGithubIssue: If you found a bug or have a feature request, please {githubLink}
specialRequestsSendEmail: For other requests, you can also contact us by email: {foundationEmail}
linkVoiceLanguageToTranslationLanguageOf: Link voice language to translation language of spoken text
pleaseConsiderToDownloadABackup: Please consider to download a backup of your configuration in order to be safe of not loosing your work.
intervalForRemindingMakeBackups: Interval for reminding to make backups
activateAutomaticGrammarCorrectionARASAA: Activate automatic grammar correction via ARASAAC's API (available for: {availableLangs})
noteThatActivatingThisSendsSentencesToAR: Note that activating this feature results in sending all constructed sentences to ARASAAC's natural language API. See {link}.
thanksToEduardoLleidaSolanoProfessorAtDe: Thanks to Eduardo Lleida Solano, Professor at the Department of Electronic Engineering and Communications of the University of Zaragoza for collaborating in the development of the ARASAAC API that integrates Natural Language Processing (NLP). It's used to provide a feature to automatically fix the grammar of sentences within AsTeRICS Grid.
couldntPlayWebradioBecauseTheBrowserDidn: Couldn't play webradio, because the browser didn't allow it.
startManuallyByUserInputEvent: Start manually by user input event
navigateToHomeGridAfterSelectingAnElemen: Navigate to home grid after selecting an element
notShowingAllResultsTryALongerSearchTerm: Not showing all results. Try a longer search term.
dontAddElementToCollectElement: Don't add element to collect element
doYouReallyWantDeleteExistingWordForms: Do you really want to delete all existing word forms and replace them by the content of the clipboard?
doYouReallyWantDeleteAllWordForms: Do you really want to delete all existing word forms?
clipboardContainsNoWordFormsPleaseCopyFr: Clipboard contains no word forms, please copy from any spreadsheet with 1-3 columns: (1) value, e.g. "are", (2) optional language code, e.g. "EN", (3) optional word form tags, e.g. "1.PERS, PLURAL".
WORDFORM_MODE_CHANGE_ELEMENTS: Change word form in grid elements
WORDFORM_MODE_CHANGE_BAR: Change word form in collection element
WORDFORM_MODE_NEXT_FORM: Change this element to next word form
toggleTagOnSelectingItMultipleTimes: Toggle tags on selecting it multiple times
infoPleaseDefineAHomeGridInManageGrids: Info: please define a home grid in "Manage grids -> Home grid" in order to reliably show correct paths.
toggleInCollectionElementIfAddedMultiple: Toggle in collection element if added multiple times
cacheAllTextsOfCurrentConfigurationExter: Cache all texts of current configuration using external voice
uartActionFailedConnection: UART action failed, couldn't open connection!
copyDirectLinkToConfigToClipboard: Copy direct link to this configuration to clipboard
usersWillBeDeletedAfterNotLoggingInFor36: Users will be deleted after not logging in for 365 days, so please create backups of important configurations.
useDictionaryOfCurrentContentLanguage: Use dictionary of current content language
astericsGridWasFundedWithinProjects: AsTeRICS Grid was developed within several funded projects
modeForHandlingTooLongTexts: Mode for handling too long texts
egJsonPath: e.g. "data.name" if JSON includes a property "data" with sub-property "name"
egElementIndex: (optional) index of element of CSS selector result
